title: Turkeys can’t fly
author: VD
content_html: And, it turns out, camels can’t walk on ice. But how could a bunch of liberals from New York City possibly know that? Nice work, Jon Stewart. Torture a camel, that will certainly show those evil ArabsWisconsin Republicans that you mean business!
content_text:
And, it turns out,
camels can’t walk on ice
.  But how could a bunch of liberals from New York City possibly know that?  Nice work, Jon Stewart.  Torture a camel, that will certainly show those evil
Arabs
Wisconsin Republicans that you mean business!
